mapper.update: update saa_user_role set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updater_code = #{updaterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time_for_his = #{insertTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_time_for_his = #{operateTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_code, role_code, start_date, end_date, updater_code, update_time, version, insert_time_for_his, operate_time_for_his from saa_user_role where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_code, role_code, start_date, end_date, updater_code, update_time, version, insert_time_for_his, operate_time_for_his from saa_user_role
